title: RECEIVED SKIN DISAPPEAR!!! BUG??
body:
Hi, my friend gift me 2 skins last time, and now they all gone , I don't know why is this happening. I can see the gift history of those 2 skins, but when i tried to use them, it appears that I need to buy it. 
RIOT pls solve this, this is ridiculous

replies.body:
Hey 33 is Mine,

It looks like these skins were gifted to you by another player.

There are a couple reasons this content may have been removed from your account - 

1) If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed.

2) If a player purchases RP and gifts content with it, and subsequently issues a chargeback for the money spent on that RP, we will remove that content.

If you don't believe these reasons are why the content was removed, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support so we can investigate further.
